alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 215 PM EDT... At 124 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Marco Island, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Belle Meade, Cape Romano, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Copeland, Royal Palm Hammock, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Fiddlers Creek, South Blocks Golde and Picayune Strand State Forest. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
